sourcesContent:
<template>
    <v-app-bar
        fixed
        dark
        dense
        style="background: linear-gradient(to right, rgba(187, 111, 59), rgb(0, 0, 0))"
        shrink-on-scroll
        height="220px"
        src='../../../../../assets/images/stage.png'
        scroll-target="#scrolling-techniques-2"
        fade-img-on-scroll
        scroll-threshold="400"
    >
      <template v-slot:img="{ props }">
        <v-img
            v-bind="props"
            gradient="to top, rgba(0,0,0,.8), rgba(0,0,0,.2)"
        ></v-img>
      </template>
      <v-app-bar-nav-icon></v-app-bar-nav-icon>
      <v-app-bar-title class="v-picker--full-width">
        Heavify
      </v-app-bar-title>
      <the-heading-navbar/>
    </v-app-bar>
</template>

<script>
import TheHeadingNavbar from "@/components/heading/TheHeadingNavbar.vue";
export default {
  components: {TheHeadingNavbar},
  data() {
    return {
      heightDecrease: 3
    }
  },
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
